column5: i am looking for reviews on any of showalter's lakes? i have been to apps/meddick and the service/fishing was phenomenal... we are looking to go back in 10' sure would appreciate any advice.. thanks kirk miller kansas
How bout a little more detail on your trips with Showalters.
KSboy2 Showalters is a from what I have seen on this site is a very good service and they are some of the best pilots out there. https://www.walleyecentral.com/dc/dcb...d=65889&page=4
